content: I'm really interested in trying out smoking meats, especially brisket and sausages. Can you tell me more about the differences between smoking with charcoal and pellet smokers? I've been watching YouTube tutorials on setting up a smoker and I'm still deciding which type to invest in. By the way, I think my cousin's new backyard had plenty of space for a smoker, I might just have to convince them to get one too!
